name: World of Words
description:
Game made for the 2020 Global Game Jam, with the theme of repair and using the diversifier: Getting Emojinal (All the graphics in the game must be emojis).

You have to collect and use words(Emojis) to repair a broken down world.

How to play:
WASD - Move
E - interact with objects
Enter - Select word to use
R - Reset level
H - Help
Esc - Quit game
